doc.title: Pizza Chase
doc.plot: Two guys sit in their Hollywood apartment discussing ordering a pizza. One wants sausage, one wants pepperoni. They flip a coin, which rolls out the door, down the stair, and through the streets. The men give chase. After they lose the coin when it falls through a grate, they settle for tacos; but when the coin suddenly rolls past, they run after it. It finally comes to rest deep in Griffith Park, with the sun beating down. What will it be?
